description: THE DARTMOUTH LABORATORY HAS A REQUIREMENT FOR A GLASSWARE WASHER TOWER
full_summary:
### Glassware Washer Acquisition Request

**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01003814

* **Tender Publish Date:** 2022-08-09
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-19T14:00:00
* **Tender Status:** Exired (Closed)
* **Solicitation Number:** 2023-00348

This is an open solicitation under the contract **E60PV-19EQUI**, which is a Supply Arrangement for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, accessories, services, and supplies. Only suppliers currently pre-qualified under this Supply Arrangement have been invited to bid.

### Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), Dartmouth Laboratory, is seeking the acquisition of a **Glassware Washer Tower**.

### Pre-Qualification Requirements

To participate in this solicitation, suppliers must be currently pre-qualified under the contract **E60PV-19EQUI** for laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, accessories, services, and supplies. Suppliers must also comply with the requirements outlined in this notice and adhere to the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement.

### Important Documentation

* Supplliers wishing to participate in this solicitation must download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI /C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response according to the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.
* Solicitation documents can be accessed via the following links:
  * English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/1e0eb4f0fa7f5cdf32821792a127455b/2023-00348-npp_english.pdf>
  * French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/b06d605aa90ca653e93f0b2309aa04f3/2023-00348_npp_french.pdf>

### Contact Information

* For more information regarding this solicitation, please contact:
  * Alexander Lisowski
  * Tel: None
  * Fax: None
  * Email: alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca

Note: Some superfluous information from the contractor's entry was discarded. Also, using styled text (like `**note**`) makes the document look more managed. Would you like to change anything? Let me know
